SimpleLeadership.PowerEventDef.label: Power Void
SimpleLeadership.PowerEventDef.description: This faction has no central authority figure. Which resulted in a power void while a new leader is established.

effects.li: Defenses at this faction's bases are weakened
Raids from this faction are disabled
Captured pawns from this faction have a reduced resistance

SimpleLeadership.PowerEventDef.label: Power Struggle
SimpleLeadership.PowerEventDef.description: This base is undergoing a power struggle to determine its new leader.
SimpleLeadership.PowerEventDef.endMessage: The power struggle at {0} has ended

effects.li: Sites generated by this base have 40% reduced threat points.
Raids originating from this base have 40% reduced points.

SimpleLeadership.PowerEventDef.label: Fortifying
SimpleLeadership.PowerEventDef.description: This base has bolstered its defenses significantly.

effects.li: Threat level is doubled when generating this base.

SimpleLeadership.PowerEventDef.label: Inspection
SimpleLeadership.PowerEventDef.description: This base is scheduled for inspection by higher command.

effects.li: Faction/Base leadership are much more likely to spawn at this base.

SimpleLeadership.PowerEventDef.label: Vigilant
SimpleLeadership.PowerEventDef.description: This base is being extremely attentive to its surroundings.

effects.li: Caravans within 10 tiles are much more likely to be noticed.
